column3: @laanwj Could this be backported to 0.12 please?\n
Not sure I agree with `-j10` as a default for documentation. Better leave it out entirely as is the case for existing documentation.\n
yeah @btcdrak  I can understand that .... do you also think I should get rid of `-j10` on line 270 as well?\n
@accraze Yes. Advanced users will add their own `-j` settings as appropriate.\n
Not sure why there is an scp line here, seems othogonal.\n
you're right, it should be removed :+1: \n
Could remove this and then also squash the commits, please?\n
Please remove the comment `# NO_WALLET=1 NO_UPNP=1`\n
yep just realized that.... it should be `arm-linux-gnueabihf`\n
You are installing the ARM specific toolchain before actually telling the reader that you'll be building for ARM.\n
Just change the header of this section to "ARM Cross-compilation"\n
